description: Aizawa Erii is a volunteer at the Star Children Academy where Seiya, his sister Seika, and Miho grew up. Her wish on a falling star was stolen by Eris. The goddess took control over Eri`s body until Eris could be completely revived into this world again. Eri and Hyouga felt a close connection when they first met.
name: Aizawa Erii
